Text: O̩do̩ ekeji ku Joash, o̩ma Jihoahaz, jʼonu Israe̩l Amazaya, o̩ma Joash onu Juda, chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼogu nyoke me̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu; oñ i je̩ o̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩la Je̩rusale̩m. Odu iye-w ñ la ko̩ Jihoadin e-Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ i fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju Jihofa che, i muda che dab e-Defid ata-wñ n; i che dab alu ku Joash, ata-wñ, che le̩ chaka.
Ma muda gbotete otete le̩ rinyo̩ n; amone̩ le̩ te̩tache iche̩bo̩ kpai otulale egujo, oj otete otete le̩.
Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼo̩da ojane̩ le̩ lonyane̩ o̩wo̩-wñ, ababa le̩ i fʼabuko̩lo̩ ku ma kpa ata-wñ onu le̩, kpa.

I muda kpa amo̩ma amakpo̩ne̩ le̩ n. I che teju alu ku ma ko̩ nyʼef o̩takada uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s, alu ku Jihofa ñwa le̩ kakini, Ma akpa amata todu amo̩ma n, ma la akpa amo̩ma todu amata n; chai e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ aku tod adure e-wñ.
I fʼabo Ido̩m icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa kpa ef o̩go̩ Omu, i ño̩ gba Sela ef ogu, tak i dʼodu o̩mo̩ ko̩ Jo̩ktie̩l, gbogbo tʼeñini.
Tak Amazaya fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ru Jihoash, o̩ma Jihoahaz, o̩ma Jihiu, onu Israe̩l, kakini, Lewa kʼa li eju.

Taku Jihoash, onu Israe̩l, fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼAmazaya, onu Juda, kakini, Ikeke kʼi de̩ Le̩bano̩n kpʼuche̩ ru Sida ki de̩ Le̩bano̩n kakini, Dʼo̩mo̩-we̩ ñw o̩ma-mi kʼi chʼo̩ya-wñ; tuk e̩wñ iñmiʼka ki dʼoko Le̩banon lale, oñ i fʼe̩re̩ tʼikeke le̩ mane̩.
Uwe̩ fʼabo Ido̩m le̩ kpa ochochi, tak e̩do̩-we̩ hi uwe̩ ne; buba-wñ waa, kʼe̩ kwoguane̩ unyi; todu e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ afʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ bʼo̩la-we̩ oji ma kʼuwe̩ ki wʼane̩, tʼuwe̩, tʼabo Juda manyʼuwe̩?
Amazaya muda gbo̩ n. Todule̩ Jihoash, onu Israe̩l mute̩gu le; tak owñ kpai Amazaya, onu Juda, kpejuru o̩la-ma Be̩t-shime̩sh, e-ki dʼojane̩ Juda.
Tak o̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l chane̩ etʼe-abo Juda le; oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma rale tʼunyabo-wñ.

Taku Jihoash, onu Israe̩l, fʼAmazaya, onu Juda kʼi chʼo̩ma Jihoash o̩ma Ahazaya, mu Be̩t-shime̩sh, oñ i lewa Je̩rusale̩m. I la faku Je̩rusale̩m kpo̩fo̩ akwo alaku Ifraim gbogbo wʼalaku ago̩go̩-wñ, owñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Tak i mʼo̩jamalia kpʼajifa, kpai e̩wñ eku du ku ma li ef unyi Jihofa ko, kpai e̩wñ ki jʼef o̩pata unyi onu, kpʼabo-ma ku ma mu ma e̩wñ uhio̩wo̩ lo ge̩, taku ma mudabi tu Samaria.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Jihoash che le̩, kpʼukpahiu-wñ, kpai alu kʼi ja kpai Amazaya onu Juda le̩, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Taku Jihoash cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji Samaria ugbo amo̩uu Israe̩l; oñ Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ abu ku Jihoash, o̩ma Jihoahaz onu Israe̩l, leku Amazaya o̩ma Joash onu Juda ño̩ deju o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩lu ta.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ kʼAmazaya che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ kʼAmonu Juda che le̩ n?
Taku ma fʼalo da nyʼu Je̩rusale̩m; oñ i ra nyi Lakish; ma muda fʼʼonuche̩ kpe̩ tʼo̩ ubi nyi Lakish, oñ ma mʼu du kpa o̩mo̩.
Taku ma mʼoku-wñ du nʼubi amanya wa; oñ ma mʼu du ji Je̩rusale̩m ugbo amata-wñ ef ewo Defid le̩.
Tak abo Juda chaka mʼAzaraya
Owñ fʼewo Hat ne, oñ i mʼu du dabiwa ñwu Juda, abu kʼonu cholu manyʼamata-wñ le̩.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu kʼAmazaya, o̩ma Joash onu Juda, iʼonu, Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Joash onu Israe̩l chane̩ ejʼonu Samaria, i la je̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyokeʼka.
I la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che. I kwo bʼadure Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat du te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.

I fʼalo̩me̩ ane̩ Israe̩l hi dabi tʼe̩gu-wñ akwʼugbo ku ma gudu wa Hemat gbogbo wa omi Araba, alu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ka, owñ chʼe-kʼi ka lʼalu adu-wñ Jona o̩ma Amitai, akache̩ kʼi chʼabo Gat-he̩fe̩r le̩.
Todu Jihofa fʼo̩bata abo Israe̩l li, abu kʼi rikoko tabale kʼe̩ne̩ du la bo̩ n, tʼe̩ne̩ ku ma dʼo̩ hi, tʼe̩ne̩ ku ma to̩no̩ kʼi tale; e̩nate̩ko du la do̩mo̩ todu abo Israe̩l in.
Jihofa la ka kʼi akpʼodu abo Israe̩l lu bʼo̩gane̩ efojale te̩ n; oñ i fʼuma jadu lʼo̩wo̩ Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Joash le̩.

Oñ o̩la Je̩ro̩boam ki bo̩, kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi che, kpʼukpahiu-wñ, alu kʼi jogu, kpʼalu kʼi dabi gba Damaskus, kpai Hemat e-Juda, ñw abo Israe̩l, inabali e-le̩ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Oñ Je̩ro̩boam cholu manyʼamata-wñ, owñ che manyʼamonu Israe̩l le̩; taku Ze̩karaya, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
